content: pick up and use the multicolor yarn knit 3 complete rounds with the multicolor as you start with row 1 of the fair isle pattern again and while you are setting up for the gusset decreases note that you will have 6 consecutive rounds of multicolor yarn at the ankle as a result instep and gusset work across the instep keeping to your pattern as established on the leg until you get to the other side of the heel flap pick up 2 + 19 st similarly on that side of the flap you will be knitting these picked up stitches with your multicolor yarn don t worry it won t be noticeable that you knit the picked up stitches differently on this side you are now at the end of right heel and getting ready to start knitting the heel you just turned knit 11 st to the center of your turned heel half of your heel of 22 st and place a marker this marker designates your new beginning of the round k 18 st and place another marker this marker designates the beginning of your left gusset area k 11 k2tog k1 first gusset decrease on the left work instep you are now at the right gusset area knit 1 ssk k 11 place another marker first gusset decrease on the right k 18 to end of round you just completed row 1 of your decreasing gusset sequence continue keeping track of the main pattern on the instep and at the same time work the gussets at the sides to gradually decrease the total circumference of your sock slip all markers as you come to them you should see your gusset areas gradually decreasing row 1 starting at beginning of row at the marker on sole k to the last 3 st before the instep k2tog k1 on instep work in pattern as established on sole k1 ssk k to end of round marker 2 decreases in this round row 2 k sole work instep k sole when you encounter a ssk st from the previous row knit into the back of the loop to get it to lay down smoothly no decreases on this round continue keeping track of the main pattern on the instep performing the gusset decreases as outlined above in your gusset areas and at the same time start working your block fair isle pattern again after those 3 row of multicolor blocks will begin at the start of the row and end exactly at the gusset marker when working the two yarns in the gusset area alternate colors by knitting one of each on successive row work each color stitch by knitting the same color into it for the remainder of that pattern repeat thus you will produce a triangular section of skinny vertical stripes for each gusset when you get to the instep the blocks start again repeat the 2 row until you once again have 36 st in your sole
